block.name: search_sobjects_soql_v2
block.description: Search for records using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.query:
SELECT 
RH_Subscription_Number__c,
ERP_Service_Contract_Number__c,
SBQQ__Contract__r.EndDate,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.CloseDate,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.Account.Name,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.AccountID,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.Country_of_Order__c,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.Owner.FirstName,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.Owner.LastName,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.Owner.Email,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.StageName,
SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.ID
FROM SBQQ__Subscription__c
WHERE SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.IsClosed = FALSE
AND SBQQ__Contract__r.SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__c != NULL
AND RH_Subscription_Number__c != NULL
AND SBQQ__Contract__r.EndDate = NEXT_N_DAYS:90
AND SBQQ__Contract__r.EndDate > NEXT_N_DAYS:89

block.name: invoke_custom_py_code
block.description: Execute Python code: Custom Token Authentication

input.code:
import base64
import datetime 
import hashlib
import secrets


def get_utc_timestamp():
    now = datetime.datetime.now()
    return now.strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')
    # return "2024-05-01T14:40:36Z"


def get_nonce():
    return secrets.token_hex(16)
    # return "ba64ce9d5bb65a35853961e9aa57c3c2"


def get_password_digest(api_secret_key, nonce, timestamp):
    combined_string = f'{nonce}{timestamp}{api_secret_key}'
    hashed_string = combined_string.encode()
    m = hashlib.sha1()
    m.update(hashed_string)
    digest = m.hexdigest().encode()
    return base64.b64encode(digest).decode()


def get_signature(api_username, api_secret_key):
    timestamp = get_utc_timestamp()
    nonce = get_nonce()
    digest = get_password_digest(api_secret_key, nonce, timestamp)
    token_string = f'UsernameToken Username=\"{api_username}\", PasswordDigest=\"{digest}\", Nonce=\"{nonce}\", Created=\"{timestamp}\"'
    return token_string

# UsernameToken Username="Red_Hat010", PasswordDigest="ZjFjYmIzNmNiYTE1ZDZkMjZkNDEyMjRjY2Q3MzdhMjlkZTRhODQ3MA==", Nonce="ba64ce9d5bb65a35853961e9aa57c3c2", Created="2024-05-01T14:40:36Z"

def main(input):
    """Sample code for returning time zone for an IP address
    Args:
        input (dict): dictionary containing input field(s) supplied in the recipe step
    Returns:
        dict: dictionary with keys matching the output schema
    """
    api_username = input["api_username"]
    api_secret_key = input["api_secret_key"]
    digest = get_signature(api_username, api_secret_key)
    return {
      "digest": digest
    }
input.name: Custom Token Authentication

block.description: Search for records using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.query:
SELECT 
Contact.Email,
Contact.FirstName,
Contact.LastName,
IsPrimary,
OpportunityId,
Role
FROM OpportunityContactRole
WHERE OpportunityID = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"ca7ff28d","path":["Opportunity ID"]}')}'
AND IsPrimary = true
